name: Sweet Punch
storyline:
In Sweet Punch we have cute characters for you to flirt with! Discover the characters' stories by exchanging messages and battling through the episodes. Make your choices and unlock different endings. Can you catch all the endings?

Sweet Punch is more than a visual novel! It's more than a fighting game! It's more than a dating game! It's the ultimate Otome game ever.
summary: In a world full of elves, orcs and sirens, you want to find your perfect match... But it can't be anyone! Your partner must be just as awesome as you! Get hit with your crushes and discover love in Sweet Punch!
